settings.location_permission_explanation:
To receive location-based notifications, CrowdWave needs access to your location.

This helps us:
‚Ä¢ Show you relevant opportunities nearby
‚Ä¢ Send notifications for trips and packages in your area
‚Ä¢ Provide better matching for deliveries

Your location is only used for notifications and is not shared publicly.
settings.location_permission_denied: Location permission denied. Please enable it in your device settings to receive location-based notifications.
settings.location_notifications_enabled: Location notifications enabled! You'll receive alerts for opportunities within your selected radius.
